metadata.title: Sony MDRXB950AP/H Extra Bass Smartphone Headset
features: Acoustic Bass Booster for incredible bass response, 40mm drivers for dynamic frequency response (3 - 28 kHz).Connectivity Technology: Wired
In-line microphone for hands-free phone calling, Compatible with Apple or Android smartphones, Free SmartKey App for customized in-line remote function
Comfortable around-the-ear design, Sophisticated aluminum, swivel design for portability, 47 1/4 in. (1.2m) tangle-free Y-type cord
description: Sleek, lush comfort, balanced audio response with unmistakable bass, and a configurable Smartphone App add-up to an unforgettable audio experience, while a flat, tangle-proof cord in conjunction with the in-line remote control ensures a seamless on-the-go mobile experience.
